addressText_1: Become a part of Jincor’s team and help us bring transparency and cost-efficiency to thousands of companies from all around the world. All you have to do is to tell your contacts about Jincor and invite them to participate in the crowdsale using the unique link below.
addressText_2: This program is valid for contributions starting from 100 ETH.
addressDetails: For more details, please email us directly at {{referralMail}} using the subject line "Jincor’s Partner Program"
inviteByEmail: You can invite people by email.
deleteEmailTip: Double click on email to delete them
